thread.title: 'Shooting' incident shuts down route into eastern Bay of Plenty
thread.title_full: 'Shooting' incident shuts down route into eastern Bay of Plenty

author: Phillipa Yalden
title: 'Shooting' incident shuts down route into eastern Bay of Plenty
text:
'Shooting' incident shuts down route into eastern Bay of Plenty PHILLIPA YALDEN Last updated 14:00, February 7 2017 MARJORIE COOK 
Police are responding to reports of an incident in the eastern BOP. 
Police have shut down the main route into Whakatane after a shooting. 
A Bay of Plenty police spokesperson confirmed there was a shooting incident and police were dealing with it. 
He said cordons were in place on SH30 between Thornton Rd and the Hub shopping centre. 
Do you know more? Email your photos, videos or newstips to 
People were advised to avoid the area, which is the only route into Whakatane. 
It's unclear what has happened but a police spokesperson says they have received multiple calls from people about the incident. 
No further information is available, the police said.
